body:
We have sent you a confirmation email.

### What happens next

We've sent your application to the Court of Protection.

They will contact you by email once they've received your application.

There may be a delay in processing your application because of the coronavirus outbreak. If your application is urgent, [contact the Court of Protection](https://www.gov.uk/courts-tribunals/court-of-protection).

[What did you think of this form](https://www.surveymonkey.co.uk/r/JC2DWGH)? (takes 30 seconds)
heading: Application sent
